achingblood.name: Aching Blood
achingblood.desc: Crit +10 when using a custom weapon with a name at least 12 characters long.

aether.name: Aether
aether.desc: Use Sol and Luna in succession when attacking. Trigger % = (Skill stat × 0.5)

aggressor.name: Aggressor
aggressor.desc: This unit deals +7 damage when he or she initiates the attack.

airsuperiority.name: Air Superiority
airsuperiority.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+30 when battling flying enemies.

amaterasu.name: Amaterasu
amaterasu.desc: Restores up to 20% HP of allies within two spaces at the start of each turn.

aptitude.name: Aptitude
aptitude.desc: Adds 10% to each stat's odds of increasing at level up.

armoredblow.name: Armored Blow
armoredblow.desc: Unit receives -10 physical damage when the unit initiates an attack.

astra.name: Astra
astra.desc: Strike five times at half damage. Trigger % = (Skill stat × 0.5)

awakening.name: Awakening
awakening.desc: Grants +30 to Hit/Avo/Crit/Ddg when HP is half or less.

axebreaker.name: Axebreaker
axebreaker.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy is using an axe/club.

axefaire.name: Axefaire
axefaire.desc: +5 damage dealt if using an axe/club.

beastbane.name: Beastbane
beastbane.desc: Enables unit in animal form to deal bonus damage to beasts.

betterodds.name: Better Odds
betterodds.desc: Restores up to 40% HP at the start of odd-numbered turns.

bibliophile.name: Bibliophile
bibliophile.desc: Grants Crit+10 when this unit is carrying three or more tomes/scrolls.

bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
bloodthirst.desc: If unit attacks and defeats a foe, grants +4 to Str/Mag/Skill/Spd for one turn.

boldstance.name: Bold Stance
boldstance.desc: When paired, this unit's partner fights as if backing up instead of being in cover.

bornsteward.name: Born Steward
bornsteward.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+20, +2 damage dealt, and -2 damage received in battle at the castle.

bowbreaker.name: Bowbreaker
bowbreaker.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy is using a bow/yumi.

bowfaire.name: Bowfaire
bowfaire.desc: +5 damage dealt if using a bow/yumi.

bushido.name: Bushido
bushido.desc: If supported by a same or lower-level unit, grants Crit+10 and +2/-2 dmg dealt/taken.

calm.name: Calm
calm.desc: Use "Wait" to gain Skill/Res+4 for one turn.

camaraderie.name: Camaraderie
camaraderie.desc: Restores up to 10% HP each turn if an ally is within two spaces.

capture.name: Capture
capture.desc: Grants Capture command if the castle has a prison. Imprisons defeated foes.

certainblow.name: Certain Blow
certainblow.desc: Grants Hit+40 when the unit initiates an attack.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: Allies within two spaces inflict +2 damage in combat.

chivalry.name: Chivalry
chivalry.desc: Grants +2 to damage dealt and -2 to damage taken against foes with full HP.

clarity.name: Clarity
clarity.desc: This unit recovers from status effects at twice the normal rate.

collector.name: Collector
collector.desc: May obtain 3 gems or ingredients for first seven turns. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.desc: If supported by a same or higher-level unit, grants Crit+10 and +3/-1 dmg dealt/taken.

counter.name: Counter
counter.desc: Damage taken from an adjacent attacking enemy is also dealt back to that foe.

countercurse.name: Countercurse
countercurse.desc: If this unit is attacked with magic damage, attacker suffers half the amount as well.

countermagic.name: Countermagic
countermagic.desc: Magic damage taken from an attacking enemy is also dealt back to that foe.

dancingblade.name: Dancing Blade
dancingblade.desc: This light-footed fighting style grants Spd+3 but Def-1.

dartingblow.name: Darting Blow
dartingblow.desc: Increases chance of follow-up attack when this unit initiates an attack (+5 eff. Spd).

daydream.name: Daydream
daydream.desc: If adjacent to paired male allies, grants +2 damage dealt and -2 damage taken.

deathblow.name: Death Blow
deathblow.desc: Grants Crit+20 when the unit initiates an attack.

defender.name: Defender
defender.desc: Grants +1 to all stats when paired up as the lead unit.

demoiselle.name: Demoiselle
demoiselle.desc: Male allies within two spaces receive -2 damage in combat.

devotedpartner.name: Devoted Partner
devotedpartner.desc: If supporting the main character, grants him or her +2 dmg dealt and -2 dmg taken.

divineretribution.name: Divine Retribution
divineretribution.desc: If unit has no weapon equipped, adjacent foes suffer half their inflicted damage.

draconicheir.name: Draconic Heir
draconicheir.desc: Recover up to 15% of max HP at the start of each turn if a Dragonstone is equipped.

draconichex.name: Draconic Hex
draconichex.desc: After combat, reduces all of enemy's stats by 4 (recovers 1/turn).

dragonfang.name: Dragon Fang
dragonfang.desc: Inflicts half of attack power as extra damage. Trigger % = (Skill stat × 0.75)

dragonskin.name: Dragonskin
dragonskin.desc: Halves damage taken, crits, and off. skills. Prevents lethal, poison, and counter skills.

dragonward.name: Dragon Ward
dragonward.desc: Halve damage when adjacent ally is attacked. Trigger % = (target's Lck x 0.5)

dualguardsman.name: Dual Guardsman
dualguardsman.desc: When paired up and in cover, grants additional Dual Guard points.

dualstriker.name: Dual Striker
dualstriker.desc: When this unit is backing up another attacker, inflicts +3 damage to enemy.

duelistsblow.name: Duelist's Blow
duelistsblow.desc: Grants Avo+30 when the unit initiates combat.

elbowroom.name: Elbow Room
elbowroom.desc: This unit deals +3 damage when fighting in a space with no terrain effects.

evasivepartner.name: Evasive Partner
evasivepartner.desc: If supporting the main character, grants him or her Avo+15 and -3 damage taken.

evenbetter.name: Even Better
evenbetter.desc: Restores up to 40% HP at the start of even-numbered turns.

evenhanded.name: Evenhanded
evenhanded.desc: This unit deals +4 damage on even-numbered turns.

evenkeel.name: Even Keel
evenkeel.desc: This unit receives -4 magic damage on even-numbered turns.

fancyfootwork.name: Fancy Footwork
fancyfootwork.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Str/Spd+1 to units within two spaces for one turn.

fearsomeblow.name: Fearsome Blow
fearsomeblow.desc: When this unit initiates an attack that KOs a foe, adjacent enemies lose 20% HP.

fiercecounter.name: Fierce Counter
fiercecounter.desc: When attacked by male enemy, grants +2 to damage dealt.

fiercemien.name: Fierce Mien
fiercemien.desc: Enemies within two spaces have Avo-10.

fiercerival.name: Fierce Rival
fiercerival.desc: If backed-up partner lands a critical, this unit criticals as well (normal miss chance).

fieryblood.name: Fiery Blood
fieryblood.desc: This unit deals +4 damage when he or she has less than full HP.

forager.name: Forager
forager.desc: Heal 20% of max HP if unit starts turn in mountain, woods, waste, or field space.

forcefulpartner.name: Forceful Partner
forcefulpartner.desc: If supporting the main character, grants him or her Hit+15 and +3 damage dealt.

foreignprincess.name: Foreign Princess
foreignprincess.desc: Foreign Army units within two spaces take -2/+2 to damage dealt/taken.

fortunateson.name: Fortunate Son
fortunateson.desc: Allies within two spaces get Ddg+15. This unit gets Ddg+5.

futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.desc: Double EXP if the unit attacks and defeats an enemy. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

galeforce.name: Galeforce
galeforce.desc: If this unit initiates an unsupported attack and defeats the foe, take another turn.

gallant.name: Gallant
gallant.desc: When supporting a female ally, she deals +2 damage.

gentilhomme.name: Gentilhomme
gentilhomme.desc: Female allies within two spaces receive -2 damage in combat.

golembane.name: Golembane
golembane.desc: Enables unit to deal bonus damage to mechanists, automatons, and stoneborn.

goodfortune.name: Good Fortune
goodfortune.desc: Restores up to 20% HP at the start of each turn. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

goodybasket.name: Goody Basket
goodybasket.desc: Recover 10 HP at the start of each turn. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

grislywound.name: Grisly Wound
grislywound.desc: Enemies lose up to 20% HP after any combat with this unit.

guardedbravery.name: Guarded Bravery
guardedbravery.desc: When supported, grants -2 damage taken. If unsupported, inflicts +2 damage taken.

haiku.name: Haiku
haiku.desc: If unit starts a turn between two allies in a vertical line, they recover 5, 7, and 5 HP.

healingdescant.name: Healing Descant
healingdescant.desc: Allies within two spaces heal up to 10% HP at the start of their turn.

heavyblade.name: Heavy Blade
heavyblade.desc: This unsubtle fighting style grants Str+3 but Spd-1.

highwayman.name: Highwayman
highwayman.desc: After attacking a foe who can't fight back, target gets Str/Spd-3 (recovers 1/turn).

hoshidanunity.name: Hoshidan Unity
hoshidanunity.desc: Increases the trigger rate of this unit's skills by 10%.

icyblood.name: Icy Blood
icyblood.desc: If hurt and attacked by nonadjacent foe, attacker takes half dmg and Skill/Spd -3.

ignis.name: Ignis
ignis.desc: Add half Mag or Str to the other value when attacking. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

inextremis.name: In Extremis
inextremis.desc: Grants Crit+30 when this unit has 25% HP or less.

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.desc: Allies within two spaces get +2 to damage dealt and -2 to damage received.

inspiringsong.name: Inspiring Song
inspiringsong.desc: Use "Sing" to grant an ally Skill/Spd/Lck+3 for one turn.

ironwill.name: Iron Will
ironwill.desc: This unit receives -4 magic damage when an enemy initiates the attack.

kidnap.name: Kidnap
kidnap.desc: Grants Capture command if the castle has a prison. Imprisons defeated foes.

lancebreaker.name: Lancebreaker
lancebreaker.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy is using a lance/naginata.

lancefaire.name: Lancefaire
lancefaire.desc: +5 damage dealt if using a lance/naginata.

lethality.name: Lethality
lethality.desc: Fell an enemy in one hit (the hit must do damage). Trigger % = (Skill stat × 0.25)

lifeanddeath.name: Life and Death
lifeanddeath.desc: During combat, +10 to damage dealt and taken.

lifetaker.name: Lifetaker
lifetaker.desc: Restores up to 50% HP if this unit initiates an attack and defeats the enemy.

lilyspoise.name: Lily's Poise
lilyspoise.desc: Grants adjacent allies +1 to damage dealt and -3 to damage taken.

livetoserve.name: Live to Serve
livetoserve.desc: When healing an ally with a staff, this unit recovers the same amount of HP.

locktouch.name: Locktouch
locktouch.desc: Allows the unit to open doors and chests without keys.

luckycharm.name: Lucky Charm
luckycharm.desc: Grants +20% to the trigger rate for all this unit's Lck-based skills.

luckyseven.name: Lucky Seven
luckyseven.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+20 for the first seven turns.

luna.name: Luna
luna.desc: Ignore half of enemy Def/Res when attacking. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.desc: Grants use of Lunge command. After attacking, switches position with target.

makeakilling.name: Make a Killing
makeakilling.desc: Obtain gold when this unit attacks and defeats a foe. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

maleficaura.name: Malefic Aura
maleficaura.desc: Enemies within two spaces take +2 damage when hit by a magic attack.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.desc: If HP > 1, survive a lethal attack with 1 HP remaining. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

miraculoussave.name: Miraculous Save
miraculoussave.desc: Save supported unit from lethal attack if HP > 1. Trigger % = (target's Lck stat)

mischievous.name: Mischievous
mischievous.desc: After combat this unit initiates, foe suffers Def-3 and may lose his or her clothing.

misfortunate.name: Misfortunate
misfortunate.desc: Enemies within two spaces get Ddg-15. This unit gets Ddg-5, however.

morbidcelebration.name: Morbid Celebration
morbidcelebration.desc: This unit recovers up to 20% HP when he or she attacks and defeats an enemy.

naturalcover.name: Natural Cover
naturalcover.desc: This unit takes -3 damage when fighting in a space with a terrain effect.

nobility.name: Nobility
nobility.desc: Grants this unit a 20% bonus to EXP.

noblecause.name: Noble Cause
noblecause.desc: When supported by a damaged unit, grants +3 damage dealt but +1 damage taken.

nohrenmity.name: Nohr Enmity
nohrenmity.desc: This unit deals +3 damage to Nohrian enemies.

nohriantrust.name: Nohrian Trust
nohriantrust.desc: This unit can use a supporting unit's triggered skills in combat.

oddshaped.name: Odd Shaped
oddshaped.desc: This unit deals +4 damage on odd-numbered turns.

opportunist.name: Opportunist
opportunist.desc: When attacking a foe who can't fight back, this unit inflicts +4 damage.

opportunityshot.name: Opportunity Shot
opportunityshot.desc: If unit is a Ballistician, automatically attack 1 enemy in range. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

optimistic.name: Optimistic
optimistic.desc: This unit recovers 150% the usual HP when healed by a staff.

optimist.name: Optimist
optimist.desc: Use "Wait" to gain Spd+4 and Lck+8 for one turn..

pass.name: Pass
pass.desc: Allows the unit to pass through spaces occupied by enemies.

peacebringer.name: Peacebringer
peacebringer.desc: All enemies and allies within two spaces deal -2 damage.

perfectionist.name: Perfectionist
perfectionist.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+15 when this unit is at full HP.

perfectpitch.name: Perfect Pitch
perfectpitch.desc: Use "Rally" to heal lower-HP allies within two spaces for 10% of their HP total.

playthings.name: Playthings
playthings.desc: Adjacent enemies lose 5 HP at start of each of this unit's turns.

poisonstrike.name: Poison Strike
poisonstrike.desc: Enemies lose up to 20% HP after any combat this unit initiates.

potentpotion.name: Potent Potion
potentpotion.desc: Makes most HP-recovery and stat- boosting items 150% as potent.

pragmatic.name: Pragmatic
pragmatic.desc: Grants +3 to damage dealt and -1 to damage taken against injured foes.

pride.name: Pride
pride.desc: Unit deals +4 damage to foes of equal or higher level. (Adv. classes add +20.)

prodigy.name: Prodigy
prodigy.desc: Deals +4 dmg to foes with Str/Mag > this unit's Str or Mag (whichever is higher).

profiteer.name: Profiteer
profiteer.desc: Get a gold bar on each of unit's first 7 turns. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

puissance.name: Puissance
puissance.desc: This unit inflicts +3 damage if her Str is at least 5 higher than the target's.

pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
pyrotechnics.desc: If unit's HP=50% or less and attacks, he and foes within two spaces lose 20% HP.

quickdraw.name: Quick Draw
quickdraw.desc: This unit deals +4 damage when initiating combat.

quicksalve.name: Quick Salve
quicksalve.desc: Can take another action after using a recovery item or tonic.

quietstrength.name: Quiet Strength
quietstrength.desc: Allies within two spaces take -2 damage.

quixotic.name: Quixotic
quixotic.desc: Grants Hit+30 and +15% to skill-trigger rate to this unit and enemy in combat.

rallydefense.name: Rally Defense
rallydefense.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Def+4 to units within two spaces for one turn.

rallyingcry.name: Rallying Cry
rallyingcry.desc: Allies within two spaces deal +2 damage.

rallyluck.name: Rally Luck
rallyluck.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Lck+8 to units within two spaces for one turn.

rallymagic.name: Rally Magic
rallymagic.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Mag+4 to units within two spaces for one turn.

rallymovement.name: Rally Movement
rallymovement.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Mov+1 to units within two spaces for one turn.

rallyresistance.name: Rally Resistance
rallyresistance.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Res+4 to units within two spaces for one turn.

rallyskill.name: Rally Skill
rallyskill.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Skill+4 to units within two spaces for one turn.

rallyspectrum.name: Rally Spectrum
rallyspectrum.desc: Use "Rally" to grant +2 to all stats to allies within four spaces for one turn.

rallyspeed.name: Rally Speed
rallyspeed.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Spd+4 to units within two spaces for one turn.

rallystrength.name: Rally Strength
rallystrength.desc: Use "Rally" to grant Str+4 to units within two spaces for one turn.

reciprocity.name: Reciprocity
reciprocity.desc: When this unit is healed by a staff, the staff user also recovers half the same amount.

relief.name: Relief
relief.desc: Restores up to 20% HP each turn if no units are within two spaces.

rendheaven.name: Rend Heaven
rendheaven.desc: Deal half foe's Str or Mag as bonus damage. Trigger % = (Skill stat × 1.5)

renewal.name: Renewal
renewal.desc: Restores up to 30% HP at the start of each turn.

replicate.name: Replicate
replicate.desc: Grants use of Replicate command. Use once per battle to create a replica.

rifledbarrel.name: Rifled Barrel
rifledbarrel.desc: When using "Cannon" command, can target adjacent spaces and affect a larger area.

rosesthorns.name: Rose's Thorns
rosesthorns.desc: Grants adjacent allies +3 to damage dealt and -1 to damage taken.

salvageblow.name: Salvage Blow
salvageblow.desc: Receive a basic weapon when attacking and defeating foe. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

savageblow.name: Savage Blow
savageblow.desc: Foes within two spaces lose up to 20% HP after any combat this unit initiates.

sealdefense.name: Seal Defense
sealdefense.desc: After combat, reduces enemy Def by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

sealmagic.name: Seal Magic
sealmagic.desc: After combat, reduces enemy Mag by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

sealresistance.name: Seal Resistance
sealresistance.desc: After combat, reduces enemy Res by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

sealspeed.name: Seal Speed
sealspeed.desc: After combat, reduces enemy Spd by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

sealstrength.name: Seal Strength
sealstrength.desc: After combat, reduces enemy Str by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

shadowgift.name: Shadowgift
shadowgift.desc: Enables non-dark mages to use dark magic.

shelter.name: Shelter
shelter.desc: Grants use of the Shelter command. Use to pull another player unit into cover.

shove.name: Shove
shove.desc: Grants use of the Shove command. Use to push an adjacent ally away one space.

shurikenbreaker.name: Shurikenbreaker
shurikenbreaker.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy is using a shuriken/dagger.

shurikenfaire.name: Shurikenfaire
shurikenfaire.desc: +5 damage dealt if using a shuriken/dagger.

shurikenmastery.name: Shuriken Mastery
shurikenmastery.desc: If unit is hit by a shuriken, attacker also takes status effects and half the damage.

sisterhood.name: Sisterhood
sisterhood.desc: Deals +2 damage and takes -2 damage when supported by a female ally.

sol.name: Sol
sol.desc: Absorb HP equal to half of damage dealt. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

solidarity.name: Solidarity
solidarity.desc: Grants Crit/Ddg+10 to adjacent allies in combat.

speedtaker.name: Speedtaker
speedtaker.desc: Spd+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked (+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

spendthrift.name: Spendthrift
spendthrift.desc: When attacking, unit expends a held gold bar for +10/-10 to damage dealt/taken.

strengthtaker.name: Strengthtaker
strengthtaker.desc: Str+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked (+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

strongriposte.name: Strong Riposte
strongriposte.desc: This unit deals +3 damage when counterattacking.

supportive.name: Supportive
supportive.desc: If paired with a support C+ attacker, grants Hit+10, +2 dmg dealt, and -2 dmg taken.

surefooted.name: Surefooted
surefooted.desc: If unit is a Ballistician, grants Mov +1 and move cost of all passable terrain is 1.

swap.name: Swap
swap.desc: Grants use of Swap command. Use to switch spaces with an adjacent ally.

sweettooth.name: Sweet Tooth
sweettooth.desc: Use "Wait" to recover 4 HP as this unit raids a hidden sweets pouch.

swordbreaker.name: Swordbreaker
swordbreaker.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy is using a sword/katana.

swordfaire.name: Swordfaire
swordfaire.desc: +5 damage dealt if using a sword/katana.

tacticaladvice.name: Tactical Advice
tacticaladvice.desc: Grants Hit+10 to attacking ally when this unit is supporting.

tomebreaker.name: Tomebreaker
tomebreaker.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy is using a tome/scroll.

tomefaire.name: Tomefaire
tomefaire.desc: +5 damage dealt if using a tome/scroll.

toxicbrew.name: Toxic Brew
toxicbrew.desc: Foes this unit attacks get Move 0, Avo-20 for 1 turn. Trigger % = (Skill stat × 1.5)

triplethreat.name: Triple Threat
triplethreat.desc: If a sword, lance, or axe hit drops HP to 50% or less, foe suffers half the damage.

underdog.name: Underdog
underdog.desc: Hit/Avo+15 if a foe's level is higher. (For adv. classes, add +20 to level.)

unmask.name: Unmask
unmask.desc: Grants +4 to damage dealt and Crit+20 if enemy is female.

vantage.name: Vantage
vantage.desc: At start of combat, if HP=50% or less, always strike first, even when attacked.

vendetta.name: Vendetta
vendetta.desc: If attacking an enemy this unit previously fought in this battle, +4 to damage dealt.

vengeance.name: Vengeance
vengeance.desc: Add half accrued damage to attacks. Trigger % = (Skill stat × 1.5)

voiceofpeace.name: Voice of Peace
voiceofpeace.desc: Enemies within two spaces inflict -2 damage with their physical attacks.

vowoffriendship.name: Vow of Friendship
vowoffriendship.desc: Grants +3 dmg dealt and -3 dmg taken if allied main character has HP=50% or less.

wardingblow.name: Warding Blow
wardingblow.desc: Unit receives -20 magical damage when the unit initiates an attack.

warp.name: Warp
warp.desc: Use "Warp" to move next to an ally and then take another action.

waryfighter.name: Wary Fighter
waryfighter.desc: Neither this unit nor enemies in combat with him/her can use follow-up attacks.

winddisciple.name: Wind Disciple
winddisciple.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+10 when HP is less than full.

witchsbrew.name: Witch's Brew
witchsbrew.desc: Obtain medicine at the end of your action for the first 7 turns. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

divineshield.name: Divine Shield
divineshield.desc: Halves damage taken. Prevents lethal, poison, and counter skills.

resiststatus.name: Resist Status
resiststatus.desc: Halves stat-reduction effects, poison damage, and the Hit of status staves.

immunestatus.name: Immune Status
immunestatus.desc: Prevents poison damage and status effects on this unit.

pointblank.name: Point Blank
pointblank.desc: Alters the range of bows to enable this unit to hit closer targets.

wingedshield.name: Winged Shield
wingedshield.desc: Protects from bonus damage against fliers. Also enables unit to benefit from terrain.

voidcurse.name: Void Curse
voidcurse.desc: Enemies earn no EXP from this unit.

selfdestruct.name: Self-Destruct
selfdestruct.desc: If HP < 50%, self-destruct and damage enemies and barriers within two spaces.

staffsavant.name: Staff Savant
staffsavant.desc: Unit can activate staves without expending a use. Sets minimum staff range at 1-10.

immobilize.name: Immobilize
immobilize.desc: When this unit hits, target's Mov is reduced to 0 and Avo by -20 for one turn.

inevitableend.name: Inevitable End
inevitableend.desc: Status effects on enemies will accumulate.

paragon.name: Paragon
paragon.desc: Doubles the EXP this unit receives.

armorshield.name: Armor Shield
armorshield.desc: Protects from bonus damage against armor.

beastshield.name: Beast Shield
beastshield.desc: Protects from bonus damage against beasts.

magictaker.name: Magictaker
magictaker.desc: Mag+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked (+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

skilltaker.name: Skilltaker
skilltaker.desc: Skill+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked (+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

lucktaker.name: Lucktaker
lucktaker.desc: Lck+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked (+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

defensetaker.name: Defensetaker
defensetaker.desc: Def+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked (+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

resistancetaker.name: Resistancetaker
resistancetaker.desc: Res+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked (+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.
